keyword: calories in small french fries mcdonalds
title: Calories in Small McDonald's French Fries
meta_description: Discover calories in small french fries mcdonalds—about 230 kcal per serving—plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, and serving tweaks for your meal planning.
h1: Calories in Small McDonald's French Fries
assumptions: McDonald's small French fries (approx. 71 g), cooked in vegetable oil blend, salted; based on official U.S. nutrition data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and portion accuracy; values from McDonald's official info as of last update. Check app or site for latest.

quick_answer.text: A small serving of McDonald's French fries contains about 230 kcal, with 29 g carbs and 3 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in small french fries mcdonalds?
What are the carbs in McDonald's small fries?
faqs.a: 29 g total carbs, including 3 g fiber and 0 g sugars.

faqs.q: How much fat is in small McDonald's french fries?
faqs.a: 11 g total fat, with 1.5 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Are McDonald's small fries high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 160 mg sodium per small serving—about 7% of daily value.

faqs.q: Small: 230 kcal; large (154 g): 510 kcal—more than double.
